text: Blabicentrus tomentosus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Dalens, Touroult and Tavakilian in 2009. It is known from Guyana.BioLib.cz - Blabicentrus tomentosus. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 2009
title: Blabicentrus tomentosus
